General.Name: Nan Yang Dyeing & Finishing Co Ltd
General.Description: Nan Yang Dyeing & Finishing Co.,Ltd engages in bleaching, dyeing, printing, finishing, knitting, processing, and selling fabrics in Taiwan, the United States, China, and internationally. The company provides cotton, rayon, and chemical fiber knitted fabrics. It also operates as a professional communication semiconductor component packaging and testing foundry. In addition, the company is involved in real estate rental business. Nan Yang Dyeing & Finishing Co.,Ltd was founded in 1964 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 233, Nanshan Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
